org.patneu.simpleflash

Class SimpleFlash.PrefsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.patneu.simpleflash.SimpleFlash.PrefsManager
  • Enclosing class:
    SimpleFlash

    protected class SimpleFlash.PrefsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Inner class that handles the saving and loading of the user preferences.

    Note: This class should not be used to set or get the settings during the normal workflow of the Activity. Use an instance of the SimpleFlash.SettingsManager class for this.
    Since:
    Version 1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      protected SimpleFlash.PrefsManager()
      Implementation of the default constructor.

      • loadBooleanPref

        protected boolean loadBooleanPref(java.lang.String prefPath,
                      boolean defaultValue)
        Loads a single preference that consists of a boolean value, using the SharedPreferences.

        Parameters:
        prefPath - the path to the preference to load
        defaultValue - the default value to return if no value was previously saved for this preference
        Returns:
        the saved value of the specified preference if there is one, the 'defaultValue' otherwise
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        loadBooleanPref(int, boolean), saveBooleanPref(java.lang.String, boolean), saveBooleanPref(int, boolean)

      • loadStartUpPrefs

        protected void loadStartUpPrefs()
        Loads the start up preferences of the application, primarily used during SimpleFlash.onCreate(android.os.Bundle).

        This method only loads the preferences the user can change in this particular Activity - namely onStart and inBackground. It doesn't return the values but changes their corresponding settings and the 'checked' state of their corresponding CheckBoxes directly.
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        loadAdvancedPrefs()

      • loadAdvancedPrefs

        protected void loadAdvancedPrefs()
        Loads the advanced preferences of the application, primarily used during SimpleFlash.onResume().

        This method loads the preferences the user can change in the separate SettingsActivity. It doesn't return the values but changes their corresponding settings directly. It is not recommended to be (only) used during SimpleFlash.onCreate(android.os.Bundle), since this would prevent the preferences from immediately taking effect after changes are made by the user.
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        loadStartUpPrefs()
